targets.expr: min(aerospike_node_stats_uptime{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
sum(aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster"})
sum(aerospike_namespace_stop_writes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})

sum(aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) + sum(aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}
count(ALERTS{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
sum(aerospike_namespace_clock_skew_stop_writes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})

panels.description: Dead Partitions in an strong consistent namespace

targets.expr: sum(aerospike_namespace_unavailable_partitions{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
sum(aerospike_namespace_dead_partitions{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})

panels.title: Unavailable / Dead Partitions

panels.description:
Shows per-second average rate of increase in

1. Total reads = client_read_success + client_read_error + client_read_timeout + client_read_not_found + batch_sub_read_success + batch_sub_read_error + batch_sub_read_timeout + batch_sub_read_not_found
2. Successful reads = client_read_success + batch_sub_read_success
3. Errored reads = client_read_error + batch_sub_read_error
4. Timedout reads = client_read_timeout + batch_sub_read_timeout
5. Not found = client_read_not_found + batch_sub_not_found

targets.expr: sum by (job, cluster_name) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_not_found{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_read_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_read_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_read_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_read_not_found{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]))

sum by (job, cluster_name) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_read_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]))

sum by (job, cluster_name) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_read_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]))

sum by (job, cluster_name) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_read_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]))

sum by (job, cluster_name) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_read_not_found{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_read_not_found{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]))

panels.title: Client Reads (TPS)

panels.description:
Shows per-second average rate of increase in

1. Total writes = client_write_success + client_write_error + client_write_timeout + batch_sub_write_success + batch_sub_write_error + batch_sub_write_timeout
2. Successful writes = client_write_success + batch_sub_write_success
3. Errored writes = client_write_error + batch_sub_write_error
4. Timedout writes = client_write_timeout + batch_sub_write_timeout

targets.expr: sum by (job, cluster_name) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]))

sum by (job, cluster_name) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]))

sum by (job, cluster_name) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]))

sum by (job, cluster_name) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[1m]))

panels.title: Client Writes (TPS)

panels.description: Display Unique Data Utilization across all  namespaces

targets.expr:
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX metric
(sum((sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining + aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining) != bool 0))
== bool 0)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
) > bool 0)

(sum((sum((sum ( (((aerospike_namespace_memory_used_data_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} + aerospike_namespace_memory_used_index_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
unless # we pick namespace which are in memory but not using Disk or Pmem
(aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} or aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} )
) 
/aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}
) 
- ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
   by (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) 
  ) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
) by (service, ns)) ) by (ns))) 
+
sum (
  ( # device-used-bytes + pmem-used-bytes
    ( # sum disk device used bytes
      ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="aerospike"}) /
      ( sum by (ns) ( (aerospike_namespace_device_compression_ratio{job="aerospike"} )) 
      *
      avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="aerospike"} ))
    )
  or
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="aerospike"}) /
    ( avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="aerospike"} ))
  )
) # end devide-used-bytes
or
( 
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="aerospike"}) /
    ( sum by (ns) ( (aerospike_namespace_pmem_compression_ratio{job="aerospike"} ))  
      * avg by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="aerospike"}) ))
or
    ( sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="aerospike"}) /
    ( avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="aerospike"}) ))     
)
)
- ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="aerospike"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="aerospike", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="aerospike"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="aerospike", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="aerospike"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="aerospike", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
   by (ns)
) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
) # end of disk+pmem used bytes

) # end paranthesis for whole sum
sum (aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})

sum (aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
* # above query should work only if the below condition satisfy
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX metric
(sum((sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining + aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining) != bool 0))
== bool 0)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
) > bool 0)

(sum((sum((sum ( (((aerospike_namespace_memory_used_data_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} + aerospike_namespace_memory_used_index_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
unless
aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}
) 
/aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}
) 
- ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
   by (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns) 
  ) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
) by (service, ns)) ) by (ns))) 
+
sum (
  (
( 
 sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) /
( sum by (ns) ( (aerospike_namespace_device_compression_ratio{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} 
)  ) *
avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) )
)
or
( 
 sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) /
( 
avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) )
)
)
- ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) !=0
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) !=0
      or
      aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
      group_left(build) (
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^6.*"}*39) !=0) 
   by (ns)
) # end of header-byte calculation by aerospike version
)
)
* # above query should work only if the below condition satisfy
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX metric
(sum((sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining + aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining) != bool 0))
== bool 0)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
) > bool 0)

panels.title: Cluster wise - Unique Data Usage

panels.description: Display Unique Data Utilization by namespaces in bytes

targets.expr:
# above query should work only if the below condition satisfy
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
) by (ns)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX + TX metric - for each Namespace
(
    (sum (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}+ aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
by (ns) == bool 0)
)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
) by (ns) > bool 0)

((
 (sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} / aerospike_namespace_device_compression_ratio{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
 ) /
(avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
OR
 (sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} )
 ) /
(avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
)- ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) !=0
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) !=0
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^6.*"}*39) !=0) by (ns)
   ) # end calculation of header-byte by server-version
)

((
 (sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} / aerospike_namespace_pmem_compression_ratio{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
 ) /
(avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
OR
 (sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} )
 ) /
(avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
)- ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) !=0
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) !=0
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^6.*"}*39) !=0) by (ns)
   ) # end calculation of header-byte by server-version
)

((sum((sum ( ((((aerospike_namespace_memory_used_data_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} + aerospike_namespace_memory_used_index_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})  )
unless # We pick up namespace which use memory, but not Disk or Pmem
(aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} or aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
) 
/aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}
) 
- ( # calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
  sum (
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) 
  by (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns)
  ) 
) by (service, ns)) ) by (ns))
)

((sum((sum ( ((((aerospike_namespace_memory_used_data_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} + aerospike_namespace_memory_used_index_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})  )
unless
aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}
) 
/aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}
) 
- ( # calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
  sum (
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) !=0
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) !=0
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) !=0) 
  by (job, cluster_name, instance, service,ns)
  ) 
) by (service, ns)) ) by (ns))
)
* # above query should work only if the below condition satisfy
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
) by (ns)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX + TX metric - for each Namespace
(
    (sum (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}+ aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
by (ns) == bool 0)
)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
) by (ns) > bool 0)

((
 (sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} / aerospike_namespace_device_compression_ratio{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
 ) /
(avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
OR
 (sum by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} )
 ) /
(avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
)- ( # begin calculate the header byte size 39bytes if as-version>=6 and 34 if as-version<6
   sum (
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^4.*"}*35) 
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build=~"^5.*"}*35) 
    or
    aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name"} * on (job, cluster_name, service) 
    group_left(build) ( 
        aerospike_node_up{job="$job_name", build!~"^5.*"}*39) ) by (ns)
   ) # end calculation of header-byte by server-version
)
* # above query should work only if the below condition satisfy
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
) by (ns)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX + TX metric - for each Namespace
(
    (sum (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}+ aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
by (ns) == bool 0)
)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
) by (ns) > bool 0)

panels.title: Namespace wise - Unique Data (bytes)

targets.expr:
# above query should work only if the below condition satisfy
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
) by (ns)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX + TX metric - for each Namespace
(
    (sum (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}+ aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
by (ns) == bool 0)
)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
) by (ns) > bool 0)
(sum (aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) by (ns) )

(sum (aerospike_namespace_master_objects{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) by (ns) )
* # above query should work only if the below condition satisfy
(sum( # Running individual exporter for each node in a cluster
    (avg by (ns) ( aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))
    == bool 
    (count by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_ns_cluster_size {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ))
) by (ns)> bool 0)
* # migration check with RX + TX metric - for each Namespace
(
    (sum (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}+ aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
by (ns) == bool 0)
)
* # Consistent Effective Replication factor across all nodes
(sum(
    min by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}) 
    == bool 
    max by (ns) (aerospike_namespace_effective_replication_factor {job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
) by (ns) > bool 0)
aerospike_node_stats_client_connections{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}
aerospike_node_stats_cluster_size{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}

aerospike_node_stats_heap_efficiency_pct{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}
